item.title: Miracle Fusion Necklace with Agate and Howlite M01
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
Among Miracle's beautiful necklaces, this absolutely stunning piece can surely be referred to as not only authentic, atmospheric and refined, but also modern and contemporary. This necklace sees an impeccable implementation of the artist's creative vision, as well as an incredible selection of materials, including semi-precious violet agate, brass chain accents, as well as stylish pairs of elongated blue howlite beads. The necklace is built around a large circular chain, giving it a bit of a modern choker vibe.

The post Miracle Fusion Necklace with Agate and Howlite M01 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
Among Miracle’s beautiful necklaces, this absolutely stunning piece can surely be referred to as not only authentic, atmospheric and refined, but also modern and contemporary. This necklace sees an impeccable implementation of the artist’s creative vision, as well as an incredible selection of materials, including semi-precious violet agate, brass chain accents, as well as stylish pairs of elongated blue howlite beads. The necklace is built around a large circular chain, giving it a bit of a modern choker vibe.

Materials

Agate is a magnificent  stone that is believed to have been one of humanity’s earliest possessions. According to researchers, Agate was mined in Ancient Egypt as early as 3500 B.C. As per Agate’s properties, it is regarded as providing a harmonizing influence. It is believed to help with balancing of emotional, physical and intellectual endeavors, harmonizing the Ying and Yang. A soothing and calming stone, Agate is thought to bring great strength gradually and is said to aid with the acceptances of oneself/building self confidence. It is also believed that Agate can improve concentration and analytical abilities, resulting in newfound practical solutions.

Howlite is considered to be a stone of calm and tranquility. A stone that can calm and soothe the emotions, help cope with an overactive mind and achieve a deep and restful sleep. Howlite is believed to reduce conflicts, facilitate communication, promote kindness, compassion and peaceful coexistence.  This truly beautiful and tranquil gem is believed to aid in clarifying one’s mind to develop a more prominent awareness of ambitions and goals. Often referred to as an ‘attunement stone’, Howlite is thought to help expand the horizons and open the mind to wisdom and new knowledge.

About Miracle

Miracle is a unique brand that is based in refined, sophisticated and feminine accessories. Accessories that combine a sense of jewelry tradition with notions of elegant, modern and contemporary jewelry. Truly a designer brand, Miracle seems to embody the commitment to a woman’s passion for outstanding accessories, creating undeniably beautiful pieces, from necklaces to earrings and bracelets. Miracle’s apt selection of favorite materials includes howlite, quartz, cat’s eye and agate. Taking a piece of Miracle’s jewelry into a hand, one can’t help but acknowledge the brand’s unmistakable original style that combines true refinement with sensual elegance.

The post Miracle Fusion Necklace with Agate and Howlite M01 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: WooDoo Deer Antler Ring W09
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
This deer antler ring is created to showcase the beauty and finesse of a natural material historically used in jewelry-making for tens of thousands of years. Polished deer antlers boast a great palette of original color shades, complemented by an authentic texture and a unique tactile feel that seems different, but somehow familiar at the same time. An original idea for a rustic designer ring, this accessory may  be considered a tribute to some of the earliest man-made jewelry, as well as poetic, yet raw beauty of nature. Being larger in size, the ring stands out with a flare of natural colors and unique tactile feel, as well as a unique patch of unpolished antler texture on the upper of the ring.

Ring sizes specified in the table below are available in stock and are ready to ship immediately. You can specify your size in the Order Notes field on the Checkout page or we shall contact you for details. Otherwise, please allow up to 5 business days for the creation of your custom ring. We also highly recommend you to consider the factors outlined here when determining your ring size, as well as consulting this excellent ring size conversion chart. If you need help determining your ring size, contact us through the chat app on this site.

The post WooDoo Deer Antler Ring W09 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
This deer antler ring is created to showcase the beauty and finesse of a natural material historically used in jewelry-making for tens of thousands of years. Deer antlers boast a great palette of original color shades, complemented by an authentic texture and a unique tactile feel that seems different, but somehow familiar at the same time. An original idea for a rustic designer ring, this accessory may  be considered a tribute to some of the earliest man-made jewelry, as well as poetic, yet raw beauty of nature. Being larger in size, the ring stands out with a flare of natural colors and unique tactile feel, as well as a unique patch of unpolished antler texture on the upper of the ring.

Materials

Antlers are extensions of the skull, seasonally grown and shed by members of the deer family. Antlers are true bone that grows symmetrically in pairs and are mostly attributable to males. The growth of these unique structures places a considerable nutritional strain on the body of a deer. The size of antlers speaks of a deer’s ability to navigate and find enough food in its environment. Since the prehistoric times antlers were used to make tools, weapons and jewelry. Some antlers have unique properties, as is the case with moose antlers that greatly aid a moose’s hearing. Antlers are well known for their use by Magdalenian culture in European Late Paleolithic. From this culture, modern museums inherited a number of beautifully carved and engraved pieces of prehistoric art, including this ‘Bison Licking Insect Bite‘ spear-thrower fragment created sometime between 10,000 – 18,000 BC.

About WooDoo

WooDoo is an extraordinary, magnetic, and minimalist jewelry brand. WooDoo is about creative exploration of space and its geometric properties. WooDoo’s quest is an inquiry into the possibilities of tangible expression of this visionary aesthetic. This brand’s jewelry transcends the realm of physical, bridging the tangible and the creative.

WooDoo pieces are majestic and truly memorable, while being handcrafted from a number of select precious woods, including African Blackwood, Bog Oak or Purpleheart Wood. Each of the brand’s pieces is an original and unique experience of jewelry aesthetic. It is this aesthetic, along with skillful execution that WooDoo’s accessories owe to the duo of creative designers standing behind this visionary brand.

The post WooDoo Deer Antler Ring W09 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
